subject: Technical support - Order #SSN3438
description_text:
I did place an order the 13th of November (#SSN3438).

I purchased a full Plus X pedal set (silver) with VAM (3 motors set),
heel-plate, spare U-mounts for the VAM motors and spare elastomers for the
pedals (green and white).

The first negative impression was on the heel-plate, all scratched and
stained.
Second negative impression was on the brake pedals, the 2-way hydraulic rod
had a big scratch on it.
Also the clutch disappointed me, the sensor was misaligned to the pedal
structure, but at least it worked.

Those were “not relevant” defects as long I was expecting all the pedals to
work properly, unfortunately the throttle input was not registered at all
making the set unusable.

Here’s proof of my statement.

Brake hydraulic rod:

Clutch misaligned loadcell sensor:

Wear of the heel-plate/base (scratches and stained material):

In the previous communications I’ve been also asked to test the throttle
and check the spring between pedal and sensor and made videos of it:
Throttle check attemp #1
<https://youtube.com/shorts/NV9xqEdVLoI?feature=share> - Throttle pedal
check #2 <https://youtube.com/shorts/KgVSold8sWY?feature=share>

Throttle pedal spring check:



The 25th of November I received the rest of the order (U-mounts, spare
elastomers), it had both items, but it was missing the correct pedal’s
U-mounts, the one you see in the picture are L-shaped:


Making a recap, I received:

• 1 Big box (18th of November) with:
- Plus X pedals (throttle not working, clutch load cell not aligned, brake
pedal hydraulic rod scratched) ❌
- Base plate (scratched and stained) ❌
- VAM Pro ✅

• 1 Small box and a small package (25th of November) with:
- Spare elastomers for the pedals ✅
- Spare mounting for the VAM Pro (wrong product, they are not the U-Mount I
ordered)❌

You no possess all the detailed informations needed, I sent a total of 15
e-mails and even called the number displayed on the website, getting no
answer:
Calling attempts <https://youtube.com/shorts/1zz0x-0fG2U?feature=share>

I would like, if possible, to RECEIVE INSTRUCTIONS on how to proceed.

If my request won't be answered or solved in a respectable amount of time I
have no choice but letting my lawyer manage this matter.


Kind regards.
